mapper.select: {#{userId, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = call nextVal(#{name, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR})}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_users (USER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_DESC, ENABLED, ISSYS, USER_DEPT, USER_DUTY, SUB_SYSTEM) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_users set USER_ACCOUNT = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_DESC = #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISSYS = #{issys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_DEPT = #{userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_DUTY = #{userDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_SYSTEM = #{subSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_DESC, ENABLED, ISSYS, USER_DEPT, USER_DUTY, SUB_SYSTEM from sys_users where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_DESC, ENABLED, ISSYS, USER_DEPT, USER_DUTY, SUB_SYSTEM from sys_users
select USER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_DESC, ENABLED, ISSYS, USER_DEPT, USER_DUTY, SUB_SYSTEM from sys_users where USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
